title: RIP Richard Adams
author: VD
content_html: The author of the great novel, Watership Down, is dead at 96. As you’ve probably already heard, Carrie Fisher, aka Princess Leia, has also died, at 60.
content_text:
The author of the great novel,
Watership Down
, is dead at 96. As you’ve probably already heard, Carrie Fisher, aka Princess Leia, has also died, at 60.
